idea-plugin.name: IDEA Mind Map
idea-plugin.description:
Mind map editor is adapted part of (SciaReto editor). It allows create and edit mind maps directly in IDE and keep them among project files with internal project links. Mind maps are saved as plain-text files in a Markdown compatible format (MMD). A mind map can have semantically linked text notes, web links and file links. Also it provides way to have strongly password-protected notes.
  • Project home page
  • Github project sources
  • Screencast about the NetBeans version
